ModMetaData.name: Flowers (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: Mlie
ModMetaData.description:
Update of Agracores mod https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1529767758
Support-chat: https://invite.gg/Mlie
Non-steam version: https://github.com/emipa606/Flowers
--- Original Description --- Version: 1.2
This mod adds a bunch of flowers into the game for decoration and to brighten up the wild.
FEATURES 8 NEW DECORATIVE FLOWERS
Chrysanthemums
Buttercups
Crocuses
Daffodils
Dahlias
Daisies
Irises
Lilies
*1.1: Basic updates.
*1.2: Added warm biomes to the growing list for wild flowers.
